metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6823 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A malicious extension could have calledbrowser.identity.launchWebAuthFlow, controlling theredirect_uri, and through the Promise returned, obtain the Auth code andgain access to the user's account at the service provider. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 75.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
